name: PaintLyfe
tag_list: paint-lyfe, paintings, digital-arts, arts, photographs, canvas, prints, story, life, digital, frames
description: An online store of Digital Paintings
overview:
Company Overview: Its a Startup, launched on 9th Jan 2013. The idea came up around 4 months back to create a portal for all art lovers because we believe paintings are for everyone but its not easily available everywhere. Artists create beautiful art/painting with so much passion but he/she doesn’t get a chance to show the artwork to the world. We are just minimizing the gap between artists and consumers(of-cousre art lovers)

Description: Painting is not just an art; it is a part of life… a part that is indispensable for an aesthetically enriched life. And, we all love this part of our life, isn’t it? And that’s why we are here. For our love of art!

PaintLyfe.com is an online portal of digital arts. Unique and Genuine. Art never differentiates. It touches our souls and binds the world together with its inspiring creativity. With the vision to create the best portal for art lovers and for all who loves creativity, we provide a solution to ship the painting at end user in such a condition that he/she just need to open up the box and hang the art at their walls. We take care of canvasing/ prints/ frames/ shipping and every single thing which needs to be done before hanging up the art at walls.

Mission: To paint everyone’s life on canvas. And for that we have a very unique feature called ” Share your Story and We’ll Paint it”
